title: Cruisin' for a Snoozin'
short_desc: The crew gathers their stuff and takes residence in a new ship that's much larger than the last.

content.text: t!8ball Does Emmett wake up from his slumber in the clearing?
ðŸŽ± | My sources say no, Zander.
t!8ball Does Sanya wake Emmett up?
ðŸŽ± | Better not tell you now, Brakia.
t!8ball Does Sanya wake Emmett up?
ðŸŽ± | Better not tell you now, Brakia.
So...
t!8ball Does Iris toss a ball of flames between her hands to keep herself occupied?
ðŸŽ± | It is decidedly so, Jelsafan0.
t!8ball Does Seth kill himself?
ðŸŽ± | Don't count on it, Bagelwrecker.
So... whatâ€™s goin on?
Emmett sleeps heavily from the events of the night, dreaming about Elf Heaven.
t!8ball Does Sanya take out her knife while next to Emmett?
ðŸŽ± | Concentrate and ask again, Zander.
ðŸŽ± | Ask again later, Zander.
Seth stretches out his body, his skin silky smooth, like a baby's.
Emmett is tired, I'm freshly risen from the dead and I feel like going to my ship lot.
t!8ball Does Sanya awaken Emmett?
ðŸŽ± | My reply is no, Brakia.
I see...
Iris keeps an eye on Sanya, worried about her and Emmett.
t!8ball Does Iris extinguish the fireball and stand to see what Sanya is doing?
ðŸŽ± | As I see it, yes, Jelsafan0.
Sanya shakes Emmett's shoulder softly. She looks over to Iris as she heads over to her.
Hello, Iriss. How are you?
Iâ€™m fine. And you?
Not.
Sanya grimaces.
I feel...
Iris stares at Sanya curiously.
ðŸŽ± | Most likely, Bagelwrecker.
Sanya coughs up some black substance and spits it up at the ground.
I feel awful...
t!8ball Does Sanya take out her knife to entertain herself?
ðŸŽ± | You may rely on it, Zander.
t!8ball Does Sanya throw her knife, hitting a tree?
ðŸŽ± | As I see it, yes, Brakia.
Iris's head veers to the tree as Sanya hits it with her dagger.
... Okay.
Sanya watches her trembling hands.
I feel wrong...
Iris crouches down next to Sanya and holds her hands to keep them still.
I... think I understand.
Seth rolls his eyes and looks out in the direction of his father's town.
Meh, I'm gonna head home and have dinner.
Seth nudges Emmett with his shoe.
Emmett, wake the fuck up. It's dinner time.
t!8ball Does Iris pat Sanya on the shoulder comfortingly?
ðŸŽ± | Outlook not so good, Jelsafan0.
Iris remains quiet and continues to observe Sanya.
t!8ball Does Seth wake Emmett up to go meet Seth's family?
ðŸŽ± | My reply is no, Bagelwrecker.
t!8ball Does Jim slap Emmett awake to go explore the nearby city?
ðŸŽ± | Better not tell you now, TheBlade.
t!8ball Does Seth suddenly start streaking and hops onto Iris's back?
ðŸŽ± | Signs point to yes, Zander.
Iris jumps, startled from Seth hopping atop off her. She struggles to get him off of her.
Get off me!
What in Sam Hill?!
Iris violently jolts her shoulders back.
What the heck?!
Seth holds his arms to the sky, somehow gyrating his hips whilst on Iris's back.
YAH YEET!
Jim holds out his arm and flexes his hand, making his way over to Iris.
Hold on, lets see if we can get em' off!
Seth laughs heartily, maintaining a firm grasp onto Iris with his legs.
Yee ha!
Ignoring Seth's antics, Sanya grabs a hold of Emmett's shoulders and shakes him lightly.
Emmett!
t!8ball Does hector wake up and immediately check his pack?
ðŸŽ± | Ask again later, MultiTheDuck.
Please, get him off me.
Yee ha like a bee haw nee haw!
I am begging you.
Why do I deal with you people?! Always acting insane?!
Hey.
ðŸŽ± | Outlook good, MultiTheDuck.
Iris glares in Jim's direction and mutters to herself, ignoring Seth's antics.
I do not act insane.
t!8ball Does Sanya get Seth off Iris's back?
ðŸŽ± | It is decidedly so, Brakia.
Sanya sighs and grabs ahold of Seth, prying him off of Iris.
Sseth, get off!
Thank you, Sanya...
Jim holds his arms out in disgust.
Can you even speak? The hell is "yigga"?
You're welcome.
Alright bye
t!8ball Does Chomsky realize he's a genius and explain the meaning of the yigga?
ðŸŽ± | Yes, definitely, PlasmaPerson.
Chomsky takes out his trademark pipe and blows bubbles out of it before pocketing it.
"Yigga" means yes.
Chomsky pushes up his glasses with his index finger.
It's a very complicated term, I don't blame you if you didn't know.
Emmett snores softly, still asleep amidst this chaos.
But why yell it and jump on someone?
Chomsky shrugs.
Beats me.
He's crazy.
Why me?
His brain has been screwed up ever since that fire...
Still naked, Seth jumps around on the ground, flailing his arms about.
Cheeki breeki brooki braaki!
Jim clicks his teeth in disgust.
Yea no, he is crazy.
Sanya watches Seth in confusion.
I have a few concernss about what'ss happening to Sseth...
Is his translator broken or something?
Seth stops jumping about and quickly flicks his head back to Sanya, giving her a serious glare.
Yeah, whatever.
Seth stands up.
SO what if I'm insane?
I can live from a gun shot to the head! Now eat my ass!
Iris's face scrunches up.
No thank you.
Chomsky smirks.
I can test that theory.
Seth scoffs and holds out his hand.
I can test it for you, hand me my pistol
We almost lost him last time, let's try not to lose him again!
t!8ball Does Iris decide to ignore Seth?
ðŸŽ± | You may rely on it, Jelsafan0.
Alright.
Chomsky hands Seth his desert eagle.
t!roll d10
ðŸŽ± | Rolling a d10... Rolled a 3, TheBlade.
Before Seth can do anything with the gun, Jim chops Seth's arm and catches the pistol.
Yea no, not trusting you with a gun right now.
Seth rolls his eyes.
Whatever.
Chomsky gives a wide troll face.
Nah, I'm sure it would've been fine.
t!8ball Does Seth snatch his gun back and shoot himself in the head?
ðŸŽ± | My reply is no, Bagelwrecker.
Good call, Jim.
t!8ball Does Emmett make soft goat noises in his sleep to alert the others?
ðŸŽ± | My sources say no, Zander.
t!8ball Does Sanya wake Emmett up?
ðŸŽ± | As I see it, yes, Brakia.
Sanya, tired of Emmett's snores, shakes him rapidly.
Hey, Emmett.
Wake up.
Emmett opens his eyes, not entirely all there.
Huh?
Are you okay?
Iris smiles softly.
Good morning.
Ah, the goat awakes.
Chomsky gives a small wave.
Morning sunshine.
Hector folds one set of arms.
You should have let him sleep, he needs to recover
What, you think he's gonna grow just from sleeping?
Hector nudges Chomsky.
His throat, not his height.
We need to get to a city.
Hector starts packing up his doctor's bag.
Agreed.
Might see what we can do about these two.
Seth, as he's putting his clothes back on, scowls at the others' lack of interest.
We are literally half a mile a way from my home town, retards.
Chomsky snaps his fingers.
Ah, yes, an elf crawling out of ones throat does mess that up.
Emmett nods slowly.
Oh, back to town then?
Sanya helps Emmett stand, propping him with her shoulder.
We have to. We don't have a sship.
Seth furrows his brow and snarls.
Well guess what, retard? I have a ship lot that we can go to and use one of the many ships I captured!
Emmett glares at Seth.
Iris gets on her feet and heads to help Sanya keep Emmett upright before realizing she likely doesn't need the help.
That was an unsavory way to word it.
How many crews have you taken down just to get their ship?
Sanya exhales loudly.
Then why haven't we done that before?
Jim rolls his eyes and mutters.
Probably just stole them while he fucked the crew.
Seth frowns at Jim.
I got them when I was a Star Fleet captain within the Elven Military.
Chomsky's interest is peaked as he gets closer to Seth.
The military, huh? What happened with that?
Had sex.
Chomsky's smile fades slightly.
I see.
Jim starts fiddling with his arm, grumbling nonsense to himself.
Home alone 76...
I had sex with a higher up's wife.
Seth beams in his arrogance.
Well worth it.
That's a little messed up...
... And you openly admit to that?
Of course I do!
Seth winks at Iris.
It's already in the Elven military's records.
Iris pinches her forehead.
... What do they see in you?
Emmett just rolls his eyes.
At least he's honest, I guess...
Chomsky doesn't put much effort into a shrug.
They see what I want to show them.
Seth gives a guttural laugh.
Lets just get a ship before someone notices the smoke...
Meh, they won't care.
t!8ball Does the crew immediately go look for a town?
ðŸŽ± | My sources say no, PlasmaPerson.
The fucking cabin housed a monster that ate children in my town.
I ssee...
Why specifically the children?
Hansel and Gretel of the universe!
Jim laughs softly.
Because they didn't know much about the flora.
Seth scoffs.
They should have avoided the damn shrooms.
If anything happened like that on Earth, the place would have been gone a while ago...
Well, we respect nature to an extent.
Seth stares at the remains of the cabin.
Also, monsters are hard to kill.
Emmett stares at the mushrooms with uncertainty.
Seth notices Emmett and snaps at him with concern.
Don't.
You call what almost killed you nature?
Jim spins his arm arrogantly.
Thats called target practice, bud.
t!8ball Does Iris kick a rock that bounces off a tree and hits her in the forehead?
ðŸŽ± | It is certain, Jelsafan0.
Iris instinctly grabs her face from the impact of the rock.
Ow.
Emmett raises an eyebrow at what Iris just did.
Jim gives a dramatic sigh and yells.
OK, CAN EVERYONE JUST PACK UP, AND LETS GO TO TOWN.
t!8ball Do we walk to Seth's hometown?
ðŸŽ± | Yes, definitely, Bagelwrecker.
Chomsky slaps his thigh.
Welp, lead the way, elf!
Iris stifles her laughter.
Which one?
Me.
Seth heads off in the direction of his hometown.
Chomsky rolls his eyes.
The one who is full elf...
Iris giggles at her own joke as no one else would.
No offense.
It was a joke!
Ahh.
As the group travels back to the kingdom, Jim calls up a buddy. His conversation is brief and quiet, however he speaks the following loud enough for the others to hear.
I'd smash, end of discussion.
Emmett checks his ears for any possible floran bites.
t!8ball Does the group find their way into town yet?
ðŸŽ± | You may rely on it, TheBlade.
Looks like we're here.
t!8ball Does Emmett try to speak out of frustration?
ðŸŽ± | You may rely on it, Zander.
Alright, I'm going to go up to my home, bye.
Seth gives a peace sign to the others before he starts to head off to his parents'.
Emmett attempts to speak, only able to wheeze out a whimper.
Se-th!
Seth spins around, his smirk fading.
Yigga?
Emmett coughs and whispers out.
Get us a big ship...
Alright, don't strain yourself, goat.
Gotcha.
Jim puts a hand on Chomsky's shoulder as if to correct him.
Squat. Not goat.
It'll be as big as my penis inside your mom's vagina!
Seth slaps his hands together and giggles.
A big ship would be nice...
Iris is unfazed by Seth's constant sexual humor.
Emmett sighs and coughs.
Fuck me then...
Yeah, not that garbage ship that we had before.
Seth gives Emmett a wink.
No thanks.
We could get that double decker, MK2, Galactica warfare.
Seth points at Jim.
No.
t!8ball Does Sanya check on the rest of the crew?
ðŸŽ± | My reply is no, Brakia.
We get another classic.
Seth slaps his rear.
Eat my ass.
Jim scoffs.
Fuck classics, we need something good.
Iris pops up.
What about the really big one my uncle always used to use when they went off planet?
The last "classics" sucked and could barely fit anything.
t!8ball Does Sean follow up on his 8ball decision and make Seth actually lead the team to the place with ships?
ðŸŽ± | Outlook not so good, PlasmaPerson.
I'm talking about a true classic!
Seth rubs his hands together.
Erm... it was... this vintage cruise thing...
Iris puts a finger to her chin, trying to remember her uncle's cruise ship.
Not those "classics", as you say.
Jim puts his index finger to his palm as he makes his point.
That Galactica has space for twice as many people we have, and has storage we need.
Iâ€™m not good with ships.
Iris shrugs.
Seth groans loudly.
We don't need storages!
t!8ball Does Iris light Emmett on fire?
ðŸŽ± | My sources say no, Enchantingtable2013.
Emmett wheezes.
We need a storage fo-r your dumb s-sex toy collection...
t!8ball Does Iris remember the name of the classic, excessively large ship?
ðŸŽ± | My reply is no, Jelsafan0.
We need room for cells, sleeping quarters, cabin, and armory...
Seth folds his arms.
Cell stupid, armory dumb!
Sanya lets go of Emmett, who's able to hold himself upright.
Why do we need cellss?
Chomsky rolls his eyes and mutters.
He's very self centered.
We're not a fucking military ship.
Chomsky perks up and speaks in a mocking singsong tone.
Whaat? Why not?
We could have a bunch of cool weapons!
Jim sighs.
Not fucking military, its a self portable cruiser with light guns.
Emmett utters out, clearly ignoring the directive to keep his throat intact.
We need at least seven rooms for us...
If you can't carry your own weapons, you can go back home.
No armory. End of discussion.
There are enough rooms to hold at least twenty of us!
Well guess what, I'm not planning on having twenty of us.
Seth sticks out his tongue.
Chomsky raises an eyebrow.
What is that screaming...?
What about the vintage cruise my uncle used to use...?
I wasn't thinking we would need twenty people.
Just saying, there is ROOM IN THE SHIP!
Well guess what? We're not buying a new ship!
I agree with Jim.
Emmett mutters to Seth.
Just take a ship from your garage.
We dont need to buy it if there is one in your garage!
t!8ball Does Matieu show a face of approval to Jim?
ðŸŽ± | As I see it, yes, Enchantingtable2013.
Matieu gives a beaky smile to Jim, who is a bit put off from it.
Seth gently pushes Emmett away from himself.
Well guess what, I don't have one!
I only collect vintage pirate ships and vintage ships!
t!choose Vintage Blorpo Andromeda, Freight Ship, Classic Mercedes Hoth, Vintage Goorpo Doono
ðŸ¤” | Bagelwrecker, You need to give at least 2 options.
Iris audibly groans.
I just suggested a vintage ship...
Just get a damn ship....
t!roll d1
ðŸŽ± | Rolling a d1... Rolled a 1, PlasmaPerson.
May-by someone you know has one, or one from your family...?
Jim and the crew enter Seth's garage after a long trek through the forest and into the city.
t!choose Vintage Blorpo Andromeda | Classic Mercedes Hoth | Vintage Goorpo Doono
ðŸ¤” | Bagelwrecker, I pick Vintage Blorpo Andromeda!
t!8ball Does Jim see a Galactica MK2 in Seth's garage?
ðŸŽ± | Yes, TheBlade.
t!8ball Does Emmett take out a small bundle of grass and start to chew upon it?
ðŸŽ± | Yes, definitely, Zander.
Jim watches as Seth enters a ship. He looks about the ship, perturbed over the label on the exterior.
The hell is a Blorpo?
Sanya pats Emmett on the back, ignoring the bickering around her.
I'm glad you're eating.
Iris straightens up at the sight of her ship.
... Is that the vintage cruise my uncle used to take?
Emmett smiles softly towards Sanya.
Seth waves his arms in the air in glory of the ship.
Ah... The Andromeda. Nice leather seats in the cockpit, wood paneling inside, five baths, fifteen rooms, a large captain's quarters, three stories, an indoor pool. I got this from a famous drug lord.
t!8ball Does Sanya check on Emmett?
ðŸŽ± | Most likely, Brakia.
Ok, thats better than the MK2...
Chomsky enters the ship from behind Seth, looking around.
Oooh, nice ride. Smells a little though...
Hector shrugs.
I like it.
You got my vote on this one.
Sanya looks down at Emmett, swiveling his head around by his chin.
Iss anything elsse wrong with you, bessidess your voice?
I had to sell some space weed for it.
Don't mind it.
What's its hull made of?
Iris claps her hands happily.
Oh! That's the one my uncle used to take!
Emmett shrugs his shoulders and frowns as Sanya looks him over.
Matieu stares daggers into Seth.
Did you sell MY space weed?
Jim knocks on a wall to hear any reverberation.
Is it strong?
It's the ultimate cruise ship.
It's got bullet proofing on it.
Seth punches a wall with full force. He takes his hand back and lodges his index finger back into place.
t!8ball Does the crew completely go on board to check around?
ðŸŽ± | My sources say no, PlasmaPerson.
Matieu sighs, entering a state of self-reflection.
I probaby have issues.
Time to go sober.
I got attacked several times while flying it.
Chomsky looks out the doorway.
Nice ship, but does it fly? Looks a little old...
Sanya takes her hand off of Emmett and backs up from him to get a better look.
Hmm. Are you feeling alright physsically?
Iris smiles widely.
Which makes sense. My uncle only liked the best.
It works, the mechanic keeps the ships in top notch condition.
Seth snaps in the air to try and get the mechanic's attention.
Who's the mechanic...?
Oh hey Gruffy.
The mechanic walks up to the ship at Seth's request.
Hey Seth, ya' takin' the Andromeda?
Yep.
Chomsky puts his hand behind his head to look cool, but only gives off an awkward aura.
'Sup, uh, Gruffy...
Let me make some adjustments to the engine real quick.
Gruffy takes out a pocket ladder that extends both upwards and horizontally to be able to work on the cruise ship's engine.
Of course.
Emmett stretches a little bit to show that he is fine physically.
That's Gruffy the Mechanic, He's one of the best mechanics for classics and vintages.
Alright...
Sanya sticks near Emmett and moves her attention to the crew's new ship.
I prefer the newer models, but this'll do.
Chomsky taps the ship.
Yeah, this'll do.
Looks great.
Might need to put some guns on it though...
Seth scowls.
I had to take them off due to Elven laws.
You have some extra?
Jim rolls his eyes.
Pfft. Never stopped Uncle Karian.
Emmett admires the girth of the ship, walking along its length with Sanya.
That'ss a BIG sship!
Iris laughs to herself.
It looks just like Uncleâ€™s!
I like the layout, not the color though...
Hector is sickened by the metallic red color of the cruise ship.
Only, uncleâ€™s had a huge cannon on the top. And it was white...
Seth shrugs.
Meh, we can paint over it.
t!8ball Does Gruffy fix up the engine?
ðŸŽ± | Without a doubt, Bagelwrecker.
Jim peers over at Gruffy, who is wrapping up his maintenance.
Hey Gruffy, you got something we can use to re-color the ship?
t!8ball Does Gruffy say yes?
ðŸŽ± | Very doubtful, TheBlade.
Gruffy thinks for a moment and shakes his head as he descends his ladder.
Not currently
t!8ball Does Emmett hop into the ship?
ðŸŽ± | It is decidedly so, Zander.
I done ran out yesterday.
Jim scoffs.
Hmm, sham.
Well, it could be worse...
Emmett nods approvingly at the ship's interior, having snuck in behind the others.
Jim looks around the garage from the interior of the ship for Emmett.
Hey, where did Emmett go?
Don't worry about it, we can fix it at the next space station.
Seth sits down on a seat along the hatch wall.
Jim shakes his head.
Its like looking after a child all over again...
Jim looks at the others, who have mixed expressions of confusion.
Don't ask.
t!8ball Does the whole crew follow Emmett inside the ship?
ðŸŽ± | My sources say no, MultiTheDuck.
Where did he go?
Hector looks about himself.
I just saw him.
Seth, clearly not worried over Emmett's whereabouts, continues to gloat.
I kinda overclocked the engine so it should go really fast. I had to escape the police a lot.
I like it, Seth.
t!8ball Does Sanya enter the ship?
ðŸŽ± | My reply is no, Brakia.
Emmett takes out a bottle of squodka harvested from the Polonot and sips it while lounging in the cockpit.
Chomsky is able to make out the sound of Emmett's hoofs klinking against the pilot's console.
Goatman is on the ship.
Hector raises a Martian eyebrow.
How do you know, human?
t!8ball Does ANYONE go in the ship except for Emmett?
ðŸŽ± | Without a doubt, PlasmaPerson.
t!8ball Does Iris fully enter the ship?
ðŸŽ± | You may rely on it, Jelsafan0.
t!8ball Does Matieu enter the ship?
ðŸŽ± | Cannot predict now, Enchantingtable2013.
Also I don't think I've properly introduced myself to most of you.
Hector puts two of his six hands on his chest.
My name is Hector.
Emmett shifts his hooves and manages to lock the entrance to the cockpit.
Iris looks up in awe at the ship's interior, partially tearing up.
... Wow, brings back... A lot of memories.
And you say this now?
t!8ball Does Seth leave the hatch to enter the ship?
ðŸŽ± | Signs point to yes, Bagelwrecker.
Hector shrugs.
Since we have a moment, why not?
Seth attempts to enter the cockpit but realizes it's locked. He peers through the door's window to see Emmett.
Emmett, let me in.
I got the keys.
And I'd rather not just call people by their races...
Iris is standing in the hallway, staring blankly into the ship, lost in memories.
Chomsky gives a devilish grin.
Why not, Martian?
Some people from some planets take that the wrong way...
Hector glares at Chomsky in disgust.
t!8ball Does Jim start searching various rooms in the ship for the crew quarters?
ðŸŽ± | Don't count on it, TheBlade.
Chomsky straightens his posture and over-emphasizes his words to be annoying.
Well, I'm Chomsky. But you can call me whatever.
Jim pivots to Seth, grinning.
So uh, you said something about a pool?
Seth points in the direction of the pool.
Yeah, It's empty though.
Hector puts a hand to his chin.
I like that name. What part of Earth is it from?
Chomsky shrugs.
Not from earth.
Emmett closes his eyes, learning back further in the comfy captain's chair.
Jim's eyes light up with stars.
Does it happen to have a see through bottom, where you can see space through the water?
I told Gruffy to keep it empty so we didn't have to clean it later.
Seth puts out his hands, not knowing the answer.
It might.
It's been a while...
t!8ball Does Emmett start to doze off?
ðŸŽ± | My reply is no, Zander.
Iris pokes her head into the room Seth and Jim are in.
I believe it does, actually.
I... could be wrong, though.
t!8ball Does Sanya finally enter the ship?
ðŸŽ± | Signs point to yes, Brakia.
t!8ball Do the remaining crew members also enter the ship?
ðŸŽ± | Yes, MultiTheDuck.
Sanya walks through the ship almost militantly, calculating the value of the interior's functionality.
Hmm...
Emmett unlocks the cockpit finally.
Iris is startled from the sound of the cockpit door opening and remains quiet.
t!8ball Does Chomsky flop into the copilot seat?
ðŸŽ± | Outlook not so good, PlasmaPerson.
Nice, seems comfortable... But I'm not sure how long that will last.
Hmmm, I need to fix up the cockpit I guess...
Seth enters the cockpit, noticing dust piling up along the walls.
Guess I should... go join the others, huh?
Iris, we're right here.
Iris expertly navigates her way to the cockpit just a few feet away and enters.
... Hey.
Emmett peers at Iris from the back of the pilot's chair.
Hey.
t!8ball Do the memories make Iris really sad?
ðŸŽ± | Yes, definitely, Jelsafan0.
t!8ball Does Seth start up the ship and launch?
ðŸŽ± | Don't count on it, Bagelwrecker.
Emmett continues to rest his hooves on the ship's console, considering that he's in the captain's seat, not Seth.
Chomsky points at Iris and Emmett.
You guys don't look so good...
Seth sighs and shakes the captain's seat.
Get the fuck up Emmett before I beat your ass.
Iris frowns and tears up.
Don't make me get the belt...
Emmett sticks up a middle digit to his father.
... Itâ€™s nothing. I just...
Iris sniffles.
Should we be worried that no one closed the doors?
I miss him...
Probably.
Hector closes the ship's hatch.
My uncle, I mean.
Chomsky took to Iris's side to try and comfort her.
This place reminds you of him that much, huh?
Considering that he had anyone else who used it beheaded? Yes...
Chomsky pulls out a family photo and shows it to Iris.
Consider yourself lucky. At least you get good memories.
t!8ball Does Seth "pust" Emmett out the way to get the controls?
ðŸŽ± | Without a doubt, TheBlade.
... Not... not always...
Iris sobs softly.
Get pusted!
Seth slaps his rear in dominance.
Oh..
What was he like? Your uncle?
Emmett winces from being pushed to the hard ship floor. He manages to look into his satchel and shows Chomsky and Iris a picture of his parents.
Seth, irritated with Emmett, decides to be an asshole.
I killed that!
Jim peers at the photograph from a distance and smirks.
I'd fuck it.
Chomsky gives Emmett a smile.
Heh, you look just like them.
But smaller.... And skinnier... And less furrier...
Emmett points at Seth angrily and mimics slashing his neck due to his previous statement.
He was nice sometimes, stern others. He didnâ€™t have a whole lot of time for me, being busy ruling the planet and all, but...
Seth rolls his eyes and sits in the captain's seat.
Go ahead, try.
Ruling an entire planet? Sounds important.
When he was around, we had fun.
Iris shrugs.
I mean, yeah. Being king of the light elves is a really important profession.
But donâ€™t get me wrong- he wasnâ€™t perfect.
Not by a long shot.
t!8ball Does Emmett try to kick Seth out of his seat and start the ship?
ðŸŽ± | Most likely, Zander.
No one is, I suppose.
Jim shifts his feet, having been leaning on the wall of the cockpit this whole time.
You know, some lady tried that back in the 8500's on Earth.
t!roll d10
ðŸŽ± | Rolling a d10... Rolled a 4, Bagelwrecker.
t!roll d10
ðŸŽ± | Rolling a d10... Rolled a 5, Zander.
Emmett puts all of his might into getting Seth out of the captain's seat and manages to push him aside. He musters out the following.

Look man, I can't have you pilot while you're mute.
Seth stands and exhales.

How does that help with flying a ship?
Jim puts his hands on his hips.
Wait, why are we letting you fly, you tried shooting yourslef a few minutes ago.

He didnâ€™t like me all that much. I could tell. I mean, he tried to ignore that I wasnâ€™t just a regular elf, but... he wasnâ€™t very good at it. He never invited my father to anything. He got me things like colored contacts, and hair dye.

Seth snaps, as if a lightbulb has just went off.
Space Station S-19.

Emmett coughs and speaks hoarsely.
Hope my voice is fixed by then...

Are... you okay?

Yeah... My childhood was... Rough, to say the least.
We'll be meeting the guy that gave me this ship.
Iris puts a hand on Chomsky's shoulder.
Do you... want to talk about it?
Though, his daughter won't be really happy to see me.
Seth laughs heartily.
My parents were nice and all, but...
Chomsky shakes his head.
No. Now isn't the time, I think.
Hector pushes past everyone else and taps Seth's shoulder.
Do you know where I could link my and Matieu's comms to your crews? I personally intend to stay around here.
Emmett sits in the co-pilot's seat and takes out one of his dad's books from his satchel.
Seth gives Hector an unhelpful mix of head shakes and head nods.
Chomsky gives an strained exhale.
I'd need more privacy and trust to talk about it. Not that I don't trust you, it's just that all of this is so new and I've only been here a couple weeks.
Thatâ€™s fine. I get it. There are things I donâ€™t like talking about either.
But... if you ever need someone to talk to... Iâ€™ll be around.
I'll keep that in mind. Same for you, too.
Chomsky stands up from the feelings pile the two ended up sitting in.
Emmett takes off his translator and shows how his communicator was attached to it. He then shows the frequency Hector would need to tune to.
Alright.
Well, enough grieving. Space awaits!
Chomsky raises his hand to the sky.
